tags.Business Owners Policies: Also known as BOP insurance, combines both property and liability coverage into one package.
tags.Contractor Policies: Protect your business with insurance designed for contractors.
tags.Farm and Ranch Insurance: Protect your home, livestock, equipment, and income with insurance designed for farm and ranch owners.
tags.Surety and Fidelity Bonds: Guarantees your work for licensing requirements and can also give potential customers added peace of mind.
tags.Workers' Compensation: Protects your employees against work-related injuries or illness. Requirements for workers’ compensation varies by state.
tags.Group Life Insurance: Get group life benefit for employee groups of five or more in all states except Massachusetts and Rhode Island.
tags.Small Business Life Insurance: Plan for the unexpected, such as loss of a key employee or the premature death of a partner, with life insurance for small businesses.
tags.Business Continuity Plans with Buy-sell: Ensure your business will land in the right hands when a business owner passes away prematurely.
tags.Key Employee Insurance: Protect your most important assets – your key employees.This policy provides life insurance for them.
tags.Employee Incentive Programs: These incentive programs help businesses reward and retain key employees, utilizing life insurance policies.
tags.Commercial Auto Insurance: Covers the cars, trucks, vans, and other vehicles you use traveling between or on jobsites.
tags.Inland Marine Insurance: Coverage for your transportable business property, such as,mobile tools or photo equipment.
tags.Professional Liability Insurance (Errors: Get covered against lawsuits filed against you for acts of error, libel or slander.
tags.Commercial Liability Umbrella Policy: Provides extra financial protection against costly lawsuits that may exceed your policy limits.
tags.Employment Practices Liability Insurance: This covers you in case you’re sued due to employment-related issues, such as wrongful termination, discrimination, retaliation, sexual harassment and other covered claims.
tags.Not-for-profit Organizations Insurance: Protects your organization from covered claims for legal defense costs, settlements, and judgments incurred by your organization because of the actions of its officers.
tags.Condominium and Homeowners Associations: Protects against property damage and lawsuits related to ownership and management of your condo association and HOA property.
tags.Small Business Retirement Plans: Let us help you retire comfortably as well as receive tax deductions for contributions made to employee retirement funds.
tags.Individual 401(k): Designed simply for owner-only businesses, this retirement plan helps you plan thoughtfully for your future.
tags.Simplified Employee Pension (SEP IRA): Help your employees get a head start on retirement savings with a SERP Investment Retirement Account (IRA) that is immediately 100% vested and where owner contributions are tax deductible.
tags.Simple IRA: An Investment Retirement Account (IRAs) is made for businesses with less than 100 employees. It’s a great benefits’ package offering, and it can help owners and employees plan for successful futures.
tags.Estate Planning: An estate plan can simple, such as a will, or it can be more elaborate, such as a trust or business continuation plans.Either way, we can help set it up.
tags.Overview: Explore U.S. Bank® deposit accounts, loans and lines of credit, payment solutions and point of sale (POS) packages for every size and type of business.
tags.Checking, Savings and Money Market: Thinking about opening a business checking package, savings account or money market? U.S. Bank has options for you.
tags.Payment Solutions: Need a card reader or mobile point of sale (POS) system? We can help you find the right U.S. Bank POS plan.
tags.Lending: Expand operations, build inventory, pay vendors and more with U.S. Bank loans and lines of credit.
tags.Credit Cards: Find the right credit card for your business, all options designed for rewards, convenience, protection and more.
